entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
